ExamplePage.title: I giusti
ExamplePage.content:
A man who cultivates a garden, as Voltaire wished.
He who is grateful that there is music on earth.
He who discovers an etymology with pleasure.
Two employees playing silent chess in a cafÃ© in the South.
The ceramist who premeditates a color and a shape.
A typographer who typesetts this page well, which perhaps he doesn't like.
A woman and a man who read the final triplets of a certain song.
He who caresses a sleeping animal.
He who justifies or wants to justify a wrong done to him.
He who is grateful that there is Stevenson on earth.
He who prefers that others are right.
These people, who ignore each other, are saving the world.

PathnamesPage.description:
Anche i nomi dei percorsi sono internazionalizzati.

Se stai usando la lingua predefinita inglese, vedrai /it/pathnames nella barra degli indirizzi del browser di questa pagina.

Se si cambia il locale in tedesco, l'URL viene localizzato di conseguenza (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Tracciati
